description:
My honorable teachers , my beloved schoolmates.Good morning，
   A lovely girl,yes!I like laughing,I like studying.That`s me-- XX,from XXXX primary school.I am eight-year-old. 
   May I have your attention?
   Today, I am very happy to be here. My topic is “LOVE ENGLISH”.
   When I was seven, I started learning English,my mother sent me to an English school.In the class, I listen carefully to my teacher, and I often ask and answer questions. I think it’s a good opportunity to practice. After class, I often read the English magazines and watch English TV programs. I hope I can make progress after class. At there, I played games and sang English songs with other children . Then I discovered the beauty of the language, and began my colorful dream in the English world.Everyday, I read English following the tapes. Sometimes, I watch English cartoons. It's funny.
　 On the weekend, I often go to the English corner. By talking with different people there, I have made more and more friends as well as improved my oral English.
   I love English. English language is now used everywhere in the world. It has become the most common language on Internet and for international trade. Learning English makes me confident and brings me great pleasure.
   I think English is great. First of all, learning English I can watch the English movies without subtitles, what’s more, I can understand the lyrics of English songs. Second，we can use English to communicate with foreigners, make more friends. We can have a lot of benefits through learning English. Thus I love English.
　 I hope I can travel around the world someday. I want to go to America to visit Washington Monument, because the president Washington is my idol. Of course, I want to go to London too, because England is where English language developed. If I can ride my bike in Cambridge university, I will be very happy.
   I hope I can speak English with everyone in the world. I'll introduce China to them, such as the Great Wall, the Forbidden City and so all.I will teaching people of the world about the beautiful language of our country.
   I know, Rome was not built in a day. I believe that after continuous hard study, one day I can speak English very well.
   I like the English language. To learn English is wonderful.
   English learning is a long journey, but I make up my mind to word hard.
